subject: docs(guide): rename sourceId/targetId to source/target in JSON format
body:
The guide now uses `source` and `target` as the connection field names
instead of `sourceId`/`targetId`. These are titles, not IDs â€” the old
names were confusing and could mislead AI models into generating UUIDs.

The import parser already accepts `source`/`target` as aliases (added
in prior commit). Updated the validation error message to match.

Tags: guide, json, ai-output, naming
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 3
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: ai-research-output
Semver: patch

https://claude.ai/code/session_0166oa9msWRq48KCJ6pyca4J
title: rename sourceId/targetId to source/target in JSON format
